trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Dexter
There were no other sightings in Dexter on or around December 10th 2005
Summary: On The aproximate date above I observed two star like objects in the sky.
divs: Sighting DetailsOn the night of December 10,2005 at approximately 10:30P.M I was outside of my house in my driveway stargazing facing due north with a pair of 10x50 binoculars I observed a small star like object in appearance appear on my apparent horizon climb vertically at a very high rate of speed(no exhaust trail of any kind).The object's color was white,not blinking or flashing or giving of a coronna of any kind.The object was about as bright as venus.As the object climbed higher it accelerated more than it was when I first observed it,at about a 70%angle in relation to me I noticed a second object,identical to the first in every charactoristic follow the same path and trjectory of the first.Both objects were far away because they initiated from my apparent horizon.The first object sped up much faster at this point,faster than anyjet I ever saw and continued to accellerate skyward straight up from the 70% angle it was before and then the was a bright flash and my first impression was that it went into earth orbit because it turned N,NE and continued in that direction eventually heading east(from my 12 oclock to my 3 oclock position in an arc.The incredible thing about this was the objects speed after the flash,I observed one of the space shuttles in orbit a few years before and this object was travelling at least three times the observed orbital speed of the space shuttle I had observed before,putting this object's velocity in the 50,000MPH range.At this point the second object had made the same (flash)and followed the exact arc and direction of travel that the first one did.about 3 minutes had passed from my first observation and the first object appeared to stop accelerate at a recipracle direction towards the NE,N then appeared to enter the atmosphere again and travel back down below the horizon from where I had first viewed it and disapeared out of sight.The second object had passed the first one heading back at the same high rate of speed then reversed course like the first one and headed back in the same reciprical heading but unlike the first object that came back down the second object appeared to stop in space and instantly became very dim and just dissapeared,my impression was that it shot out to deep space, unlike the first object.I do not believe that these object were man made.
